name: karaokenatin
description: P2P Karaoke System with Tauri Host and Next.js Web Client

scripts.build:host: cd apps/host && pnpm run build && pnpm run tauri build
scripts.build: pnpm run build:signaling-exe && pnpm run build:host
scripts.setup:packages: cd packages/shared && pnpm install && cd ../../apps/signaling-server && pnpm install && cd ../host && pnpm install && cd ../web-client && pnpm install
